project_abstract.cdata: The Feeder Road Project for Benin will comprise: (a) improvement and subsequent maintenance of about 845 km of rural roads, and initial maintenance of 425 km improved under the Zou-Borgou Cotton Project; (b) strengthening of the Directorate of Roads and Bridges (DRB) in the Ministry of Equipment by the creation of a new division for feeder roads; and (c) technical assistance to DRB for the implementation of the above program and for the training of local staff.
